title: Falken Design ACM Aluminum Composite Sign Panel, White Matte, 12" x 18" x 1/8"
features: Aluminum composite panels (comparable to Dibond) provide excellent durability in outdoor applications
It is unbreakable, stain resistant and weather resistant.
It is a very rigid, durable and strong material although it is very light in weight.
Aluminum composite panels are one half the weight of aluminum
It is a very economical cladding material as compared to other options available in the market
description: Falken Design Aluminum Composite panels feature two thin sheets of Aluminum enclosing a Polyethylene core. They are lightweight but strong and the extremely flat surface is great for printing high quality graphics or text. Applications are POP Displays (Long-term), Framing, Signage and more. Recommended fabrications are mounting (cold), digital printing, screen printing, painting, saw cutting, routing, die cut/punch.
